article:
My name is David. It _ my birthday yesterday. An old lady stopped _ in the street. "It's your birthday, "she said. . " Let me look _ your hand. Yes, you have a _ called Mark, and you like ice cream _ cheese. Today you will see fire; your mother will go away and a tiger will come to your house."
I went to Mark's home. He and his sister _ a birthday cake and lighted the candles for me. But I was thinking about the old  lady's words. I wanted to go home, so I said _ to them and ran home. Good, there was no fire, Mum wasn't at home. Oh, no... I thought about the old lady's words again. Then Mum walked in withMark and a box. "Here's your _ . It's a lovely little dog and his _ is Tiger," said Mum. "But _ about the fire and the old lady?" I asked. "The fire is the candles," Mark smiled and said, "and we hired the old lady."
